hard_constraints.description: sanity check: make sure we don't bust the weight limit or the bag's gonna rip.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- S = #sum { W, I : selected(I), item(I, V, W) }, limit(N), S > N.

soft_constraints.description: the whole point is to get rich, so we gotta maximize that value.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("MaximizeValue", I, -V) :- selected(I), item(I, V, W).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Tuple : penalty(Name, Tuple, Cost) }.
